name: African polka dots
description:
Hair Bow

The perfect accessory for any day of the week.

Handmade from Kente print, these hair bows are the perfect addition to your outfit.

Each hair bow measures approximately 5"(L) x 3" (W). The snap clip is unattached so you can take it off completely and use a pin to wear it as a broach. Bows stay secure in hair by 70 mm Snap Clip. (Included)

* Print patten of the bow may vary according to the cut of the fabric. NO TWO BOWS WILL LOOK ALIKE.*

You can also choose the bow with (black) hard or soft headbands. Please specify if you prefer a handband option; snap clip comes standard (70mm). (Headband examples in store. Headbands will vary: all black, approximately 1.5 in)

Bow ties 
Male and female bow ties, clip on style. 
A metal clip in the back, easy to wear. 
One size fits all.

Handle with love and care. Hand wash only in cold water. Do not bleach. Air dry.

Earrings

Button earrings are making waves on the fashion scene.

Each pair of earrings is one of a kind. Each button earring is covered by hand with African kente fabric. No two pairs will look exactly alike due to the variation of patterns on the fabric.

These earrings are made of an aluminum button, fabric, stainless steel earring post and includes a rubber stopper.

Clip on earrings are available for an extra $2. Select the clip on option in addition to the earrings.

Size: Large: Earrings are approx 1 1/2 inches (a little bigger than a quarter) *Shown (60) 
Medium: Earrings are approx 1 1/8 inches (45) 
Small: Earrings are approx 7/8" around. (30)

Any questions or concerns should be addressed to Globalcouture@aol.com

Be pretty and bold in this unique bow design.

Kente Cloth Colors 
Kente Cloth Colors denote specific meanings. Below is a list of colors and their meanings:

• Blue – peace, togetherness, love and harmony 
• Black – maturity, spiritual energy, mourning, funeral and passing rites 
• Gold – high worth, richness, fertility, royalty, prosperity, monetary wealth 
• Green – land, crops, vegetation, harvest, growth, spiritual growth and renewal 
• Yellow – high worth, richness, fertility, royalty, prosperity, monetary wealth 
• Grey – Healing rituals; cleansing rituals; symbolizes ash 
• Pink – feminine; mildness and feminine qualities 
• White – pureness, cleansing rites and festivals 
• Maroon – mother earth and healing 
• Red – death; funerals; mourning 
• Purple – feminine; worn by girls and women 
• Silver – peace and joy; referencing to the moon

Super soft cotton t-shirt with a female cut that provides a figure flattering look. Printed with an original design, sure to be a classic. Crew, sizes SM to 4x. This is an original design by Global Couture owner, painted by Ash the painter, then assigned to garments. 

Canvas Tote (small & large*)
Perfect tote for running errands, shopping, gym, school, or work
*large shown 
(19" x 15" x 6")
 

iPhone case 4/4S

Coffee mug: Ceramic coffee mug

If you are interested in the curly girl with the red bow please send me an email for pre orders: globalcouture@aol.com

Global Couture is trying to spread the word about embracing your natural hair. Love your curls, if they are wavy, curly, kinky or coily.

Questions can be addressed at globalcouture@aol.com

Product Care (i.e., washing) instructions: 
Screen printed t-shirts have a print that can last for years, since the ink is fixed ‘in’ the shirts and not on them. However, it is recommended to treat your screen printed t-shirts with care to ensure the print quality. 
•	ALWAYS wash inside out 
•	For the first 2 washes, wash by hand in cold water 
•	Use low temp washing program only 
•	NEVER tumble dry t-shirts with screen prints 
•	Iron shirts inside out

name: Traffic Light
description:
Hair Bow

The perfect accessory for any day of the week.

Handmade from Kente print, these hair bows are the perfect addition to your outfit.

Main colors: Yellow, teal, magenta & black

Each hair bow measures approximately 5"(L) x 3" (W). The snap clip is unattached so you can take it off completely and use a pin to wear it as a broach. Bows stay secure in hair by 70 mm Snap Clip. (Included)

* Print patten of the bow may vary according to the cut of the fabric. NO TWO BOWS WILL LOOK ALIKE.*

You can also choose the bow with (black) hard or soft headbands. Please specify if you prefer a handband option; snap clip comes standard (70mm). (Headband examples in store. Headbands will vary: all black, approximately 1.5 in)

Bow ties 
Male and female bow ties, clip on style. 
A metal clip in the back, easy to wear. 
One size fits all.

Handle with love and care. Hand wash only in cold water. Do not bleach. Air dry.

Earrings

Button earrings are making waves on the fashion scene.

Each pair of earrings is one of a kind. Each button earring is covered by hand with African kente fabric. No two pairs will look exactly alike due to the variation of patterns on the fabric.

These earrings are made of an aluminum button, fabric, stainless steel earring post and includes a rubber stopper.

Clip on earrings are available for an extra $2. Select the clip on option in addition to the earrings.

Size: Large: Earrings are approx 1 1/2 inches (a little bigger than a quarter) *Shown (60) 
Medium: Earrings are approx 1 1/8 inches (45) 
Small: Earrings are approx 7/8" around. (30)

Any questions or concerns should be addressed to Globalcouture@aol.com

Be pretty and bold in this unique bow design.

Kente Cloth Colors 
Kente Cloth Colors denote specific meanings. Below is a list of colors and their meanings:

• Blue – peace, togetherness, love and harmony 
• Black – maturity, spiritual energy, mourning, funeral and passing rites 
• Gold – high worth, richness, fertility, royalty, prosperity, monetary wealth 
• Green – land, crops, vegetation, harvest, growth, spiritual growth and renewal 
• Yellow – high worth, richness, fertility, royalty, prosperity, monetary wealth 
• Grey – Healing rituals; cleansing rituals; symbolizes ash 
• Pink – feminine; mildness and feminine qualities 
• White – pureness, cleansing rites and festivals 
• Maroon – mother earth and healing 
• Red – death; funerals; mourning 
• Purple – feminine; worn by girls and women 
• Silver – peace and joy; referencing to the moon

Kente Cloth Colors
Kente Cloth Colors denote specific meanings. Below is a list of colors and their meanings:

•    Blue – peace, togetherness, love and harmony
•    Black – maturity, spiritual energy, mourning, funeral and passing rites
•    Gold – high worth, richness, fertility, royalty, prosperity, monetary wealth
•    Green – land, crops, vegetation, harvest, growth, spiritual growth and renewal
•    Yellow – high worth, richness, fertility, royalty, prosperity, monetary wealth
•    Grey – Healing rituals; cleansing rituals; symbolizes ash
•    Pink – feminine; mildness and feminine qualities
•    White – pureness, cleansing rites and festivals
•    Maroon – mother earth and healing
•    Red – death; funerals; mourning
•    Purple – feminine; worn by girls and women
•    Silver – peace and joy;

Super soft cotton blend t-shirt with a female cut that provides a figure flattering look. Printed with an original design, sure to be a classic. Crew, sizes SM to 4X. This is an original silk screen design by Global Couture owner.

Global Couture is trying to spread the word about embracing your natural hair. Love your curls, if they are wavy, curly, kinky or coily. 

natural hair. Love your curls, if they are wavy, curly, kinky or coily. 

Product Care (i.e., washing) instructions:
Screen printed t-shirts have a print that can last for years, since the ink is fixed ‘in’ the shirts and not on them. However, it is recommended to treat your screen printed t-shirts with care to ensure the print quality.
•	ALWAYS wash inside out
•	For the first 2 washes, wash by hand in cold water
•	Use low temp washing program only 
•	NEVER tumble dry t-shirts with screen prints
•	Iron shirts inside out

Kente Cloth Colors
Kente Cloth Colors denote specific meanings. Below is a list of colors and their meanings:

•    Blue – peace, togetherness, love and harmony
•    Black – maturity, spiritual energy, mourning, funeral and passing rites
•    Gold – high worth, richness, fertility, royalty, prosperity, monetary wealth
•    Green – land, crops, vegetation, harvest, growth, spiritual growth and renewal
•    Yellow – high worth, richness, fertility, royalty, prosperity, monetary wealth
•    Grey – Healing rituals; cleansing rituals; symbolizes ash
•    Pink – feminine; mildness and feminine qualities
•    White – pureness, cleansing rites and festivals
•    Maroon – mother earth and healing
•    Red – death; funerals; mourning
•    Purple – feminine; worn by girls and women
•    Silver – peace and joy;
